meanings.definition: The state or quality of being oblate.
meanings.sent1: The oblateness of the pancake made it easy to stack.
meanings.sent2: The oblateness of the Earth is why it bulges at the equator.
meanings.sent3: The oblateness of the tire caused it to wobble comically down the road.
meanings.sent4: Her oblateness in the dance class made her stand out from the other students.
meanings.sent5: The oblateness of the balloon made it look like a squished ball.

meanings.definition: The degree to which a spheroid deviates from a perfect sphere.
meanings.sent1: The oblateness of the watermelon made it roll in a funny way.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the oblateness of planets to understand their shape.
meanings.sent3: The oblateness of the basketball caused it to bounce unpredictably.
meanings.sent4: The oblateness of the moon was visible through the telescope.
meanings.sent5: The oblateness of the rock made it difficult to balance on its edge.
